body.p:
Commonwealth of Kentucky
Mercer County Sct. Feby 23rd 1864,

It appearing to the satisfaction of the undersigned Presiding Juedge of the county court for the county aforesaid that on or about the 19th day of January 1864 one George W, McKinney murdered John J Gritton in the county of Mercer and that said George W, McKinney is now a fugitive from justice; these are therefore respectfully to request his eExcellency the Governor to offer a reward of five hundred dollars for the apprehension of the said McKinney and his safe delivery to the legal authorities of the county for trial.
Given under my hand at Harrodsburg in said county this 23d Feby. 1864.

Thos Edwards
Presiding Judge of Mercer County Court

Attest
C. S. Abell clerk
Mercer CO. Court Ky

Mercer Co
$250 Reward for Geo W McKinney
24th Feby 1864
